column4: Stupid question to follow.  I installed Clamtk virus scan and tried to update the signatures database.  It says I must be root to install updates.  What does that mean and how do I do it??
means you need to do a sudo command via terminal
KillerOrca/Nvidiot : Ok.  But what is the update command?  I have no idea.
just google the clamav page for a command list with descriptions
they also have their own irc if you need help: /server irc.freenode.net
